title: Person of Interest - 4x22 - Can you hear me?
author: YT.POI
comment:
- can you hear me?
- * beep * yes.
- good, now kill the lights.
one of the most badass scenes ever in the series..

Greer was awesome in this episode, as always.
''Every leader who ever preached peace did so guarded by armed men.''
Words cant describe how much i love this show. Too bad cbs doesnt recognize how much of a gem this show is. Knowing the writers will make 13 episodes epic

Is it just me, or does Greer remind anyone of Emperor Palpatine in the Star Wars series? I know they are two different actors playing these two roles, but their cold, calculating manner is very much the same.
Greer is fucking badass and his words are always terrific! All these deaths (I think Elias and Control are also dead) really annoyed me but I still love him and Samaritan.
